column5: EXQUISITE! Guadalupe River condo with favorable amenities and convenience in every direction! This condo offers 2-bedrooms/2 -bathrooms with a king-size bed, queen-size bed, and sleeper sofa. Sleeps up to 6 people, Plasma TV/DVD, fully furnished, & includes linens, cookware, washer/dryer, and WIRELESS INTERNET.
column8: Beautiful Guadalupe River hideaway only 6 blocks from SCHLITTERBAHN and COMAL - Waterwheel F-202
